definition: the thin liquid that is left from milk after the solid part (called curds) has been removed
a place where pigs are kept especially in order to produce young
the activity of applying scientific knowledge to the design, building and control of machines, roads, bridges, electrical equipment, etc.
the study of engineering as a subject
the process of changing or making something change into glass, or a substance like glass
the scientific study of volcanoes
a judgement of the value, performance or nature of somebody/something
a meeting in which an employee discusses with their manager how well they have been doing their job; the system of holding such meetings
an official right to be the only person to make, use or sell a product or an invention; a document that proves this
a formal talk that a person gives to an audience
the language used when speaking; the fact of speaking rather than writing
the ability to speak
the way in which a particular person speaks
a group of lines that an actor speaks in a play in the theatre
a long piece of writing completed by a student as part of a university degree, based on their own research
a statement or an opinion that is discussed in a logical way and presented with evidence in order to prove that it is true
to test a metal or chemical substance, often to see how pure it is
a particular way of doing something
the quality of being well planned and organized
there is a reason for somebody’s behaviour and it is not as strange or as stupid as it seems
the art, process or job of taking photographs or filming something
the action of choosing somebody/something in an election or at a meeting
an arrangement that you make, with a shop for example, to pay later for something you buy
money that you borrow from a bank; a loan
the status of being trusted to pay back money to somebody who lends it to you
money that you have in your bank account; if you or your bank account are in credit, there is money in the account
a sum of money paid into a bank account; a record of the payment
the right to use a service up to a certain limit, paid for in advance
a payment that somebody has a right to for a particular reason
praise or approval because you are responsible for something good that has happened
a person or thing whose qualities or achievements are praised and who therefore earns respect for somebody/something else
the act of mentioning somebody who worked on a project such as a film or a television programme
a film, play, television programme, etc. that somebody has worked on
a unit of study at a college or university (in the US, also at a school); the fact of having successfully completed a unit of study
if something does credit to a person or an organization, they deserve to be praised for it
to give somebody the praise they deserve, even if you do not really want to
to have achieved something
used to introduce the good points about somebody/something, especially after the bad points have been mentioned
making somebody deserve praise or respect
the power or right to do or say what you want without anyone stopping you
the state of not being a prisoner or slave
the state of not being ruled by a foreign or cruel government
the state of being able to move easily
the state of not being affected by the thing mentioned
permission to use something without limits
the chance to change the way that something happens and influence decisions that are made
any chemical substance obtained from petroleum oil or natural gas
machines as a group, especially large ones
the parts of a machine that make it work
the organization or structure of something; the system for doing something
